name: Thought Shield III
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as thought shield I, but the circumstance bonus on Will saves to resist mind-affecting effects increases to +8. In addition, any creature that tries to read your thoughts while this spell lasts must succeed at a Will save or be stunned for 1 round. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同思维护盾 I（Thought Shield I）一般，不过在抵御影响心灵（mind-affecting）效果时，意志豁免得到的环境加值增加至+8点。此外在法术持续期间，任何尝试阅读你的思维的生物都必须进行一次意志豁免，失败则会被震慑（stunned）1轮。该法术可以被降阶施法。
